languages.text: {n}Зауэрбэк сочувственно вздыхает.{/n} "Печально, Ториана. Всего год назад никому бы в голову не пришло сомневаться в полезности твоей семьи. Но одна ошибка отправила в забытье все успехи".

traits.locale_text: {n}Зауэрбек сочувственно вздыхает.{/n} "Печально, Ториан. Всего год назад никому бы в голову не пришло сомневаться в полезности твоей семьи. Но одна ошибка отправила в забытье все успехи".

languages.text: {n}Macharius sighs with sympathy.{/n} "Such a tragedy, Toriana. To think that not but one year ago no one could have doubted your family's usefulness. Yet it took a single mistake to cast all of your accomplishments into oblivion."
languages.original_text: {n}Зауэрбэк сочувственно вздыхает.{/n} "Печально, Ториана. Всего год назад никому бы в голову не пришло сомневаться в полезности твоей семьи. Но одна ошибка отправила в забытье все успехи".

{n}Macharius sighs with sympathy.{/n} "Such a tragedy, Toriana. To think that not but one year ago no one could have doubted your family's usefulness. Yet it took a single mistake to cast all of your accomplishments into oblivion."

languages.text: {n}マハリウスが同調してため息をつく。{/n}「何という悲劇だ、トリアーナ。1年前なら、お前の一族を役立たずだなんて考える者は誰もいなかっただろう。それが、ひとつの過ちですべての功績が忘れ去られてしまったとは」
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius sighs with sympathy.{/n} "Such a tragedy, Toriana. To think that not but one year ago no one could have doubted your family's usefulness. Yet it took a single mistake to cast all of your accomplishments into oblivion."

traits.locale_text: {n}マハリウスが同調してため息をつく。{/n}「何という悲劇だ、トリアーナ。1年前なら、お前の一族を役立たずだなんて考える者は誰もいなかっただろう。それが、ひとつの過ちですべての功績が忘れ去られてしまったとは」

languages.text: {n}马卡里乌斯同情地叹了口气。{/n}“这真是个悲剧，托丽安娜。想想看，仅仅是一年前，还没有任何人会怀疑你们家族的地位。然而，仅仅是一个错误，就让你们多年来的一切成就化为乌有。”
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius sighs with sympathy.{/n} "Such a tragedy, Toriana. To think that not but one year ago no one could have doubted your family's usefulness. Yet it took a single mistake to cast all of your accomplishments into oblivion."

traits.locale_text: {n}马卡里乌斯同情地叹了口气。{/n}“这真是个悲剧，托丽安娜。想想看，仅仅是一年前，还没有任何人会怀疑你们家族的地位。然而，仅仅是一个错误，就让你们多年来的一切成就化为乌有。”

languages.text: {n}Macharius suspira con empatía.{/n} «Vaya tragedia, Toriana. Y pensar que, hace apenas un año, nadie habría puesto en duda la utilidad de tu familia. Mas solo te ha bastado un error para condenar todos tus logros al olvido».
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius sighs with sympathy.{/n} "Such a tragedy, Toriana. To think that not but one year ago no one could have doubted your family's usefulness. Yet it took a single mistake to cast all of your accomplishments into oblivion."

traits.locale_text: {n}Macharius suspira con empatía.{/n} «Vaya tragedia, Toriana. Y pensar que, hace apenas un año, nadie habría puesto en duda la utilidad de tu familia. Mas solo te ha bastado un error para condenar todos tus logros al olvido».

languages.text: {n}Macharius pousse un soupir compatissant.{/n} « Quelle tragédie, Toriana. Dire qu'il y a un an encore, nul n'aurait pu remettre en question l'utilité de la maison Gaprak... Il aura suffi d'une simple erreur pour réduire tous vos exploits à néant. »
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius sighs with sympathy.{/n} "Such a tragedy, Toriana. To think that not but one year ago no one could have doubted your family's usefulness. Yet it took a single mistake to cast all of your accomplishments into oblivion."

traits.locale_text: {n}Macharius pousse un soupir compatissant.{/n} « Quelle tragédie, Toriana. Dire qu'il y a un an encore, nul n'aurait pu remettre en question l'utilité de la maison Gaprak... Il aura suffi d'une simple erreur pour réduire tous vos exploits à néant. »

languages.text: {n}Macharius seufzt mitfühlend.{/n} "Was für eine Tragödie, Toriana! Noch vor einem Jahr hätte niemand an der Nützlichkeit Eurer Familie zweifeln können. Und dann reichte ein Fehler, um all Eure Erfolge vergessen zu lassen."
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius sighs with sympathy.{/n} "Such a tragedy, Toriana. To think that not but one year ago no one could have doubted your family's usefulness. Yet it took a single mistake to cast all of your accomplishments into oblivion."

traits.locale_text: {n}Macharius seufzt mitfühlend.{/n} "Was für eine Tragödie, Toriana! Noch vor einem Jahr hätte niemand an der Nützlichkeit Eurer Familie zweifeln können. Und dann reichte ein Fehler, um all Eure Erfolge vergessen zu lassen."

languages.text: {n}Macharius, şefkatle iç çekiyor.{/n} "Çok büyük bir trajedi Toriana. Hele bir de daha bir yıl önce ailenin hayrının su götürmez olduğunu düşünürsek. Tek bir hata, tüm başarılarınızı hiç etmeye yetti."
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius sighs with sympathy.{/n} "Such a tragedy, Toriana. To think that not but one year ago no one could have doubted your family's usefulness. Yet it took a single mistake to cast all of your accomplishments into oblivion."

traits.locale_text: {n}Macharius, şefkatle iç çekiyor.{/n} "Çok büyük bir trajedi Toriana. Hele bir de daha bir yıl önce ailenin hayrının su götürmez olduğunu düşünürsek. Tek bir hata, tüm başarılarınızı hiç etmeye yetti."
